subject: unable to get pedals working
description_text:
Early version of Simsonn pedals pro 1.7.0.

were working fine for quite a while, now unable to use them in almost all
titles.

Downloaded Simsonn Manager latest version and attempted to update firmware,
but have been unable to do it manually or automatically.

Please advise.

Mike aka Sim UK

conversations.body_text: i understand i need v1.8 for simsonn manager to detect the pedals
in addition.  v3.5 crashes with this error...  v4 says wrong firmware and to use 3,5  manager does not see pedals at all.

Hi Sim UK,     Please first restore the pedals to factory settings using Freejoy 1.7.0, and then V3.5 should be able to recognize them.   https://drive.google.com/file/d/1hnHNudj0VhE6xr7ypu-KeEDuVrlVHVg9/view?usp=drive_link

OK,

Many thanks!   Will do.

What then is the process to upgrade the firmware?

Which order etc?

Many thanks indeed,

M. Aka Sim UK

Hi,

Thank you for your help thus far.

I have reset the pedals to 1.7.0.

I still am not getting 100% on the AXIS and have the same error message.

[image: image.png]

Please advise.

Kindest regards,

M

also,

Z axis and sliders are noisey.

[image: image.png]

Hi Sim UK,  Please open Freejoy 1.7.0 and click “Read Config from Device.” Then go to “Axis,” keep the X, Y, and Z axes unchanged, and uncheck the Output for the other axes. Finally, click “Write Config to Device,” and these axes will be disabled.

Many thanks,

I have done that already, but V3.5 still won't recognise the pedals?

Would you have a tutorial to explain HOW to upgrade to Version 1.8, so that
I may use the official Simsonn software instead of a third party version?

Many thanks,

M
Hi Sim UK,    Please first send me a screenshot of Freejoy so I can confirm the version, and then I will guide you through the upgrade.
